info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 5:57PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Hardin County through 630 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Honey Island, or near Saratoga, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Silsbee, Kountze, Village Mills and Honey Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
